item.title: COMMUNICATION CLIENT SERVER
item.description: PARTIES INVOLVED Server Side Server-side programming is a processing of a user’s request by interpreting a script on the web server to dynamically generate HTML pages as a response. Client Side Client-side programming is the way that web pages manage events, make requests to the server and make simple validations and it is integrated into the HTML code Ajax Request It is not a programming language but a tool to communicate the client side with the server side.

item.title: Definiciones
item.description: Babel WebPack Prototype Polyfill Prototype is a framework written in JavaScript that is oriented to the simple and dynamic development of web applications. webpack is an open source JavaScript module package, used to generate static files representing those modules Babel and Polyfill are tools that help to modernize our code PHP Frameworks from php PHP is a programming language designed to develop applications for the web and create web pages, favoring the connection between servers and the user interface.
